pkgmetadata.longdescription: List of English Words from the Scrabble Dictionary // List of english scrabble words as listed in the OTCWL2014 https://www.s crabbleplayers.org/w/Official_Tournament_and_Club_Word_List_201 4_Edition. Words are collated from the 'Word Game Dictionary' https://www.wordgamedictionary.com/word-lists/.
